column4: Try opening your document in Firefox and then using it's print selection for adjustments. Just a suggestion.No clue if it will work for you or not.
I would not know where to start. I have not used that program for PDF based viewing. I normally use Adobe-Acrobat.
I just opened a PDF with the basic document viewer in Ubuntu, i have all the common options for printer adjustments.
Page Scaling - Fit page to printable area.
